entry.source: I cannot wholly dismiss the idea that my own{F801}bias is showing here, but I've set up a quest.{F801}Is the {F804,5}gate to the Expanse{F804,0} related to {F804,5}Lilith's{F804,0}{F801}reason for wanting the Reactor...? And who is{F801}this "friend" she spoke of? Will all be made{F801}clear if we {F804,5}reach the Yamato Reactor?{F804,0}{F801}
